longBusinessSummary: The fund invests primarily in non-U.S. securities, including securities of issuers located in emerging markets. It invests at least 80% of assets in securities of companies with small market capitalizations. The fund invests primarily in common stocks. It allocates investments across different countries and regions. The advisor uses fundamental analysis of factors such as each issuer's financial condition and industry position, as well as market and economic conditions, to select investments.
